issue.title: Pricing: new pricing profile php warning
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

On creation of a new pricing profile:

```

Warning: Creating default object from empty value in C:\wamp\vhosts\dev\components\com_easysdi_shop\models\pricingprofile.php on line 83
```


&getData tries to load an id=0 profile.

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2

comments.body:
**Original author :** Battaglia Marc

Sorry but unable to reproduce... Please specify the context.

**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Hi Jérôme !

If I create a new pricing profile I get the mext message:
!2015-06-09 19_04_53-ASIT VD - ASIT VD.png!

(PHP & Joomla must have Warning ON)

**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

Hi Jérôme,

Any news on this defect ?

**Original author :** Blatti Yves

All good, thanks
